arcade.vis

Class EnvDrawer2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.vis.Drawer
      • arcade.vis.EnvDrawer2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnvDrawer2D.Rectangular, EnvDrawer2D.Triangular

    public abstract class EnvDrawer2D
extends Drawer
    Drawer for environment lattices in 2D.

    EnvDrawer2D copies values in a Lattice array into a 2D array representation.

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.X
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
